name: Lab Lockdown(Alpha)
description:
This is a project I started working on for a college project,

This is my first time making a Unity 2D game.

I am looking for feedback and ideas to improve the game, I may turn this into a full game in the future.

As of right now there is no story, or goals.  just survive.

feel free to give me feedback in comments 

or here https://forms.gle/e8mmwL21wK2k2rxc6

Play a online only version here:

https://simmer.io/@Chaz/ai-project-alpha

Controls are:

W,A,S,D / ARROW KEYS for movement

Shift to sneak, Q to sprint

Escape to pause

left click to fire red bullet(deals damage) right click to fire blue(stuns,  enemies can build resistance overtime)
